Neighborhood: Meadow Hills
Price: $1161867
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 3
House Size: 1885 sqft
Description: Welcome to your new dream home in the desirable neighborhood of Meadow Hills. This stunning 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom home boasts 1885 sqft of luxurious living space. As you step inside, you'll be greeted with a bright and spacious open floor plan, perfect for entertaining family and friends. The living room features large windows that allow natural light to flood in, highlighting the elegant hardwood floors and modern fireplace.

The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, with granite countertops, sleek stainless steel appliances, and ample cabinet space. Adjacent to the kitchen is a cozy dining area, perfect for intimate dinners.

The master bedroom is a peaceful retreat, boasting a spacious walk-in closet and a spa-inspired en-suite bathroom with a luxurious soaking tub and separate shower. The two additional bedrooms are generously sized and share a modern bathroom.

Step outside to your private backyard oasis, complete with a covered patio, perfect for al fresco dining, and a lush green lawn, perfect for outdoor activities.

Neighborhood Description: Meadow Hills is a highly sought-after neighborhood known for its quiet and family-friendly atmosphere. The streets are lined with beautiful homes and well-manicured lawns, giving the neighborhood a charming curb appeal. The community is filled with friendly and welcoming residents, creating a close-knit and supportive environment. Enjoy easy access to nearby parks, schools, and shopping centers. Come experience the best of suburban living in Meadow Hills.

Neighborhood: Maplewood
    Price: $833999

    Description: This charming 4 bedroom, 1 bathroom home sits nestled in the vibrant and welcoming neighborhood of Maplewood. With 3426 sqft of living space, this home offers plenty of room for families of all sizes. As you step inside, you are greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere, featuring hardwood floors and large windows that allow natural light to flood in. The spacious living room is perfect for entertaining guests, while the cozy fireplace invites you to relax after a long day. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with modern appliances, ample counter space, and plenty of storage. Imagine waking up in the morning and enjoying a cup of coffee on your private balcony in the master bedroom, overlooking the picturesque tree-lined streets of Maplewood. The other three bedrooms are perfect for children, guests, or even a home office. And with a full bathroom, getting ready in the morning will be a breeze.

    Neighborhood Description: Maplewood is a bustling and family-friendly neighborhood with a strong sense of community. The tree-lined streets are filled with charming homes and friendly faces. The neighborhood is known for its excellent schools, making it the perfect place for families with children. Maplewood also has a vibrant downtown area, filled with local shops, restaurants, and cafes, perfect for a weekend stroll or a night out with friends. With easy access to public transportation and major highways, commuting to work or exploring the city is a breeze. Come and be a part of this vibrant and welcoming community in Maplewood.

With a warm and welcoming atmosphere, Sunnyvale is the perfect place to call home.
